title: Mini-Ep 287: Eggplant & Horse Head & Bath
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 287: Eggplant & Horse Head & Bath
description:
Kate wonders if she should immortalize the eggplant emoji on her body and Doree enjoys the most Doree-like show on Netflix with her mom. Then, listeners send in an eczema product that hasn’t been suggested before, wonder about the sticky world of self-tanner, and commiserate with Kate about judging yourself when learning a new skill.


  • Join Kate’s Virtual Book Launch Party with Doree TONIGHT! (Deadline to register is 9AM est)
  • Order Kate’s book In A New York Minute
  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter.
